cookies.a11y-accept: Accept the use of all cookies.
cookies.a11y-accept-selected: Accept the use of the selected cookies. You have {{functional}} agreed to functional cookies. You have {{statistic}} agreed to statistic cookies.
cookies.a11y-functional: Agree the use of functional cookies.
cookies.a11y-statistics: Agree the use of statistic cookies.
cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you return to our website and to allow you to access your data and settings. We also use these technologies for statistical purposes.
cookies.intro-privacy1: You will find more information in our
cookies.update-later: You can review and change these settings at any time via the data protection menu.
cookies.category-essential-desc: Some cookies are required by the application to work correctly. These are, for example, authentication data after signing in.
cookies.category-functional-desc: Functional cookies make the application more user-friendly by allowing settings (e.g. the selected theme) to be saved locally.
cookies.category-statistics-desc: Statistical cookies help us to improve the application by giving us insight into how our application is used.

header.a11y-back: Go back to the previous page.
header.a11y-room: Open the user menu. Here you can view the rooms you have attended or log out of your account. You will also find a link to a help page and settings for language and display.
header.a11y-switch-role: Switch role to see participants view.

home-page.a11y-join-button: Enter the room with the specified room number.
home-page.a11y-join-input: Here you can enter the  key of the room you want to join. Your lecturer will tell you the room number.
home-page.a11y-welcome-message: Welcome to {{title}}. Enter an eight-digit room number to join a room.
home-page.a11y-user-message: You are now on the user page.
home-page.a11y-room-join: Now enter the room number of the room you want to join.
home-page.a11y-update-available: A new version is available. To get the latest changes press the tab key. To perform the update press the tab key again.
home-page.a11y-update-made: You are using the latest {{title}} version now. To get the latest changes press the tab key. To close the dialog press the tab key again.
home-page.a11y-update: Perform the update and close the dialog. The page will be reloaded then.
home-page.a11y-close: Closes the dialog and gos back to last page.
home-page.exactly-8: A room number has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.only-numbers: A room number only contains digits.
home-page.see-news: A detailed list of the changes can be found in our
home-page.hot-fix-update: We have made some minor improvements and bug fixes.

login.a11y-sso-login: You will be forwarded to {{provider}} to log in.
login.a11y-reset-pw: Go to a form to reset your password.
login.a11y-register: Go to the registration to create an user account.

password-reset.forgot-password: We will send you an e-mail to reset your password.
password-reset.new-password-successful: Your new password has been set.
password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.
password-reset.set-new-password: You have been sent a code with which you can set your new password.
password-reset.request-failed: Something has gone wrong. Please check your input.

register.register-request-error: Something went wrong. Maybe you already made the account?
register.register-successful: Your account has been created. Please check your mails.
register.please-accept: You must agree to the terms of use to register.

user-profile.a11y-message: You are now in the account page.
user-profile.guest-hint: You are not logged in and use a guest account.
user-profile.delete-account-info: If you delete your account, all the rooms you created will be deleted.
user-profile.preferences-description: Here you can configure display settings that are active in all your rooms.
user-profile.visualization-unit-percent-info: Results on single-choice and Likert questions are displayed in percent.
user-profile.answers-below-chart-info: Answer options displayed directly below chart rather than as a list.
user-profile.show-results-directly-info: Content results are displayed directly when presented.

room-list.a11y-join-room: Enter the room {{room}} with the number {{id}} in the role {{role}}.
room-list.a11y-list-summary: Your room list contains {{count}} rooms. Search the list or navigate through your rooms with Tab.
room-list.a11y-more-options: Show more options for this room
room-list.a11y-import-options: Opens a menu in which you can transfer rooms created as a guest or import rooms from another ARSnova system.
room-list.filter: Here you can filter the list of rooms.
room-list.no-rooms: You haven't created any rooms yet.
room-list.room-successfully-removed: The room was successfully removed from the list.
room-list.added-successfully: The room was added to your list.
room-list.transfer-rooms-from-guest: Transfer rooms you created or visited without being logged in.
room-list.transfer-no-rooms: No rooms were found for transfer.
room-list.active-info: There are currently {{userCount}} people in this room.

user-activation.a11y-key-input: Enter the verification code that you received by e-mail.
user-activation.verification-info: If you have not yet received a verification code, please check your e-mails again in a few minutes and make sure that it has not been filtered out as spam.

dialog.a11y-update: Save the changes and close the dialog.
dialog.a11y-comment-presentation: The post {{comment}} is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the Q&A page.
dialog.not-logged-in: You are not logged in. The room will be created with a guest account.
dialog.really-delete-room: Do you really want to delete the following room? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-cancel-room-membership: Do you really want to remove the following room from your list? If you have been granted access permissions, this will also remove them.
dialog.really-delete-account: Do you want to irrevocably delete your account with all rooms?
dialog.community-lang: This language is maintained by the community and therefore may be incomplete or outdated.
dialog.contribute-to-lang: You can contribute to the translation via the following link:
dialog.really-leave-room: Do you really want to leave the room?

errors.not-authorized: You're not authorized to view this page.
errors.room-not-found: There was no room found with this number.
errors.http-too-many-requests: Too many requests from your network.

hotkeys.a11y-help-key-announcement: Press {{helpKey}} for a list of keyboard shortcuts.

focus-mode.presenter-controls-app: The presenter guides you trough the room.

comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all posts marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all posts marked as wrong
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1h: Show all posts of the last hour
comment-list.a11y-select-time-3h: Show all posts of the last 3 hours
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1d: Show all posts of the last day
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1w: Show all posts of the last week
comment-list.creation-not-allowed: Creating posts is now no longer possible.
comment-list.creation-currently-not-allowed: The creation of posts is currently not allowed.
comment-list.comments-are-not-enabled: The Q&A section is not enabled.

comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the Q&A page.
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This post was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This post was marked as favorite.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: This post was marked as not correct.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: This post has been answered with: {{answer}}.
comment-page.a11y-send: Sends your post and closes the dialog.
comment-page.a11y-tag: Select a category here if you want to categorize your post.
comment-page.comment: The post {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{favorite}} {{answer}}
comment-page.new-comment: A new post with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.comment-sent-to-moderator: Your post will be reviewed by a moderator.

content.a11y-wordcloud-info: Used keywords by frequency in descending order.

survey.a11y-message: You are now in live feedback mode.
survey.a11y-status: Currently the survey is {{status}}. {{state0}} percent have selected answer {{answer0}}, {{state1}} percent have selected answer {{answer1}}, {{state2}} percent have selected answer {{answer2}}, {{state3}} percent have selected answer {{answer3}}.

room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this room there are {{count}} question series. Tab between them and press Enter to get to the question series.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no contents in this room yet.
room-page.a11y-copy-url: Copy link to room to the clipboard
room-page.url-copied: Room link was copied to the clipboard.

statistic.a11y-message-overview: You are now on the statistics overview.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation-answers: You can now see the results. {{answers}} participants have answered the content. Navigate through the answers with the tab key.
statistic.a11y-group-progress: {{percent}} percent of the contents in the question series {{group}} were answered correctly.
statistic.a11y-content-result: The content {{content}} has been answered by {{count}} persons so far, {{abstentions}} persons have abstained.
statistic.a11y-choice-result: The content was answered correctly by {{percent}} percent.
statistic.a11y-go-to-statistic: Press the Enter key to get to the evaluation of the content.
statistic.a11y-multiple-round-counts: {{countRoundA}} answers in round 1, {{countRoundB}} answers in round 2
statistic.a11y-no-more-answers: There are no more answers. Press the right arrow key to go to the next one.
statistic.a11y-no-more-questions: There are no more contents available.

templates.name: Name
templates.please-fill-tags: Please select at least one tag.

templates.license-description-cc-by-nc-4-0: Allows others to distribute, remix, adapt and build upon the template for noncommercial purposes as long as attribution is given to the creator.
templates.license-description-cc-by-nc-sa-4-0: Allows others to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the template  for noncommercial purposes as long as as attribution is given to the creator. Templates based on this must be licensed under identical terms.
templates.is-ai-generated: This template was created with the help of AI.
